channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brazil’s Bold Climate Finance Plan Could End Tropical Deforestation
item.description: The $125 billion Tropical Forest Forever Facility has the potential to end tropical deforestation. The business community has an essential role in mak...

item.title: Why Investors May Be Underestimating The Biggest Risks Of The 2020s
item.description: Investors are facing a cascade of system shocks. From energy to food and finance, resilience may be new investment lens needed for risk, strategy, and...

item.title: Best Airports In The U.S. And Canada, Rated In A New Report
item.description: The latest J.D. Power study ranks the best (and worst) airports in North America.

item.title: California’s High-Speed Rail Project Is A Disgraceful Boondoggle
item.description: California taxpayers will continue to be railroaded by the state's ill-conceived bullet train boondoggle.

item.title: Veloz's $43.5M National Campaign Is The Messaging Boost EVs Need
item.description: The national Electric For All campaign, powered by nonprofit organization Veloz, aims to reshape Americans' perceptions of EVs through truth, trust an...

item.title: Increasing the dosage
item.description: If you’re taking the wrong medication, that’s not going to help. It doesn’t matter how fast you’re going if you’re headed in the wrong direction.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.

item.title: New post
item.description: There’s a button in WordPress that initiates a new post. And another that publishes it. That’s a clear and practical metaphor for what we do, all day,...

item.title: Often give in

item.title: Kinds of reckless
